name: heavily
content:
heavily adverb
(TO A GREAT DEGREE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 to a great degree: The terrorists are heavily armed. The compound is heavily guarded. She's heavily involved in the project.
More examplesFewer examplesEstimates of the amount of money needed to decontaminate the heavily polluted chemical installations vary.The country depends heavily on foreign aid.It had snowed heavily during the night and in the morning the garden was a white fairyland.The forest has been so heavily logged that it is in danger of disappearing.When I saw him after the accident he was still in shock and was heavily sedated.
